Functions
LR_fnc_SafeZone
Description

Create a safezone where shooting is prohibited around given position. Duration of the safezone can be set.

Arguments
_SafeZoneSize

Size of the safezone in metres <SCALAR>

_SafeZoneDuration

Duration in seconds for how long the safezone shall be active <SCALAR>

_SafeZoneLocation

Position of the safezone <POSITION 3D>

Return Value

None

Example

Nothing to see here

Author: MitchJC
